column4: hey guys, any recommendations for a versioning backup tool in the repos?  Basically I want incremental/versioned backups from my webserver over ftp
svn, git, mercurial, although none are specifically designed for websites they can handle the task
graphics in them will be a bit of bloat though
yea I use git at work, but i dont really want to manage using it as a backup tool, I was thinking of backup-manager, which sounds quite good
